owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pendingOwner().details: Returns the address of the pending owner.

proxiableUUID().details: Implementation of the ERC-1822 {proxiableUUID} function. This returns the storage slot used by the implementation. It is used to validate the implementation's compatibility when performing an upgrade. IMPORTANT: A proxy pointing at a proxiable contract should not be considered proxiable itself, because this risks bricking a proxy that upgrades to it, by delegating to itself until out of gas. Thus it is critical that this function revert if invoked through a proxy. This is guaranteed by the `notDelegated` modifier.

params._campaignId: Campaign ID to push rewards from

params._signerAddress: Address that will be authorized to sign attributions

renounceOwnership().details: Overrides OpenZeppelin's renounceOwnership to prevent accidental calls

transferOwnership(address).details: Starts the ownership transfer of the contract to a new account. Replaces the pending transfer if there is one. Can only be called by the current owner. Setting `newOwner` to the zero address is allowed; this can be used to cancel an initiated ownership transfer.

params._allowed: Whether the token address should be allowed
params._tokenAddress: Address of ERC20 token or address(0) for native crypto

updateCampaignStatus(uint256,uint8).details: Only campaign manager or attribution provider can call this functionStatus transitions are strictly controlled based on current status and caller role

params._campaignId: ID of the campaign to update
params._newStatus: New status to set for the campaign

params._publisherRegistryAddress: New address of the publisher registry

params.newTreasuryAddress: New address to receive protocol fees

upgradeToAndCall(address,bytes).details: Upgrade the implementation of the proxy to `newImplementation`, and subsequently execute the function call encoded in `data`. Calls {_authorizeUpgrade}. Emits an {Upgraded} event.

params._to: Address to send the remaining balance to

claimRewards(uint256[],address).notice: Allows recipients to claim their rewards from multiple campaigns

getAvailableProtocolFees(uint256).notice: Gets the available protocol fees for a campaign

getCampaignTotalBalance(uint256).notice: Gets the total balance for a campaign

getCampaignTotalFunded(uint256).notice: Gets the total amount funded for a campaign

getConversionConfig(uint256,uint8).notice: Gets a conversion config for a campaign

getPublisherPayoutAddress(string).notice: Gets the payout address for a publisher from the registry

getRecipientBalance(uint256,address).notice: Gets the current balance for a recipient in a campaign

getRecipientClaimed(uint256,address).notice: Gets the total amount claimed by a recipient in a campaign

pushRewards(uint256,address[]).notice: Allows owner to push rewards to multiple recipients

renounceOwnership().notice: Disabled to prevent accidental ownership renunciation

updateAllowedTokenAddress(address,bool).notice: Updates whether a token address is allowed for campaigns

updateAttributionProviderSigner(uint256,.notice: Updates the signer address for an attribution provider

updateCampaignStatus(uint256,uint8).notice: Updates the status of a campaign

updateTreasuryAddress(address).notice: Updates the treasury address for protocol fee collection

withdrawRemainingBalance(uint256,address.notice: Withdraws remaining balance from a completed campaign
